article.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman announces Pentagon deal with ‘technical safeguards’
article.summary: OpenAI's CEO claims its new defense contract includes protections addressing the same issues that became a flashpoint for Anthropic.

analysis.title_ja: OpenAI’s Sam Altman announces Pentagon deal with ‘technical safeguards’
analysis.summary: OpenAI's CEO claims its new defense contract includes protections addressing the same issues that became a flashpoint for Anthropic.

all_candidates.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman announces Pentagon deal with ‘technical safeguards’
all_candidates.summary: OpenAI's CEO claims its new defense contract includes protections addressing the same issues that became a flashpoint for Anthropic.

all_candidates.title: OpenAI、米国防総省とAI導入で合意　Anthropicへの強硬措置の沈静化を要請
all_candidates.summary: OpenAIは、米国防総省（DoW）の機密網へのAI導入で合意した。トランプ政権が安全策撤廃を拒むAnthropicの排除を決めた直後の発表だ。OpenAIは「クラウド限定運用」や「保護条項」の明文化により、自律型兵器への転用を防ぐ多層的な安全網を維持。政府の強硬姿勢を軟化させ、業界全体の合理的な合意を目指す姿勢を示した。

all_candidates.title: OpenAI、17兆円超の資金調達　Amazon、NVIDIA、SBGが出資
all_candidates.summary: OpenAIは、企業価値7300億ドルの評価に基づき、総額1100億ドルの資金調達を発表した。Amazon、NVIDIA、ソフトバンクGが参画。Amazonとは戦略的提携を結び、AWS上で記憶を保持するAIエージェント基盤「Stateful Runtime」を共同構築する。Amazon独自チップの活用も進め、計5GWに及ぶ計算資源を確保する計画だ。

all_candidates.title: The trap Anthropic built for itself
all_candidates.summary: Anthropic, OpenAI, Google DeepMind and others have long promised to govern themselves responsibly. Now, in the absence of rules, there's not a lot to protect them.

all_candidates.title: Anthropic’s Claude rises to No. 2 in the App Store following Pentagon dispute
all_candidates.summary: Anthropic’s chatbot Claude seems to have benefited from the attention around the company’s fraught negotiations with the Pentagon.
